description.value:
Trigger A creature begins its turn in the fog

Effect The fog surges with energy, dealing @Damage[(6d10+27)[bludgeoning]] damage to all creatures in the fog as it harmfully mutates their bodies. Creatures in the area must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:32] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage. It resists mutation.

Failure The creature takes full damage. Its flesh becomes coated in foul-smelling blisters for 1 hour. For as long as it has this mutation, it is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} and can't reduce the value of its sickened condition.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage. Its limbs become painfully twisted for [[/gmr 1d4 #hours]]{1d4 hours}. For as long as it has this mutation, it is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} and can't reduce the value of its sickened condition.

details.description: A fog of transmutative fumes fills a 30-foot radius area, painfully mutating creatures who enter.
details.disable: @Check[nature|dc:35] (master) to neutralize the fog, or @Check[survival|dc:35] (master) to disperse the fog
